questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.answer_details: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.answer_details: Mars is known as the Red Planet because of its reddish appearance.

questions.question: Which programming language is known as the 'language of the web'?
questions.answer_details: JavaScript is called the 'language of the web' because it is the primary programming language used to add interactivity and dynamic behavior to web pages, meaning almost every website utilizes JavaScript to create features like animations, user input responses, and updates without needing to reload the entire page, making it the dominant scripting language on the web across all major browsers.

questions.question: What is the largest country in the world by land area?
questions.answer_details: Russia covers a vast area of approximately 17 million square kilometers, making it significantly larger than any other country.

questions.question: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
questions.answer_details: The Italian painter, scientist, and draftsman (1452-1519) began working on the portrait in 1503 and continued to add layers of oil glazes over several years. The painting is considered one of the most famous portraits in the world and is on display at the Louvre in Paris.

questions.question: What is the highest mountain in the world?
questions.answer_details: Mount Everest's peak is the highest altitude above mean sea level at 29,029 feet [8,848 meters].
